page.title: 04Gnosall First School
page.content: St. Lawrence First School St. Lawrence is a well organised little school with a high-spirited group of respectful 4.5-9 year olds. There are ten classes with about 28 pupils in each making a total of 272 well-cared for, good average pupils. There is an old building, a new building built in 1972 and an annex. The 12 teachers cover 11 subjects as well as extra curricular activities including dancing, football, athletics, gymnastics, chess and birdwatching. The polite children respond well in the happy, working atmosphere. The walls are brightly decorated with a high standard of pupils' artistic and written work. Pupils in Class 8 (aged 9) took part in the Domesday Survey.
